QuestData.Title: Decisions, Decisions
QuestData.Description: This is no magic solution to my curse! It's just a hammer!$b$bI may be crazy, but I'm not stupid.$b$bThere's NO WAY I'm gunna use this to break my shiney - not after all I've gone through to get it.$b$b<Budd pauses in thought for a moment.>$b$bBut that means I'm stuck down here for eternity...$b$bI had just learned to sail, you know.$b$bOhhh... I can't decide.$b$bHere, you take the hammer and I'll just set the shiney down and look the other way.
QuestData.LogDescription: You must use The Pewter Pounder to destroy The Pewter Prophet.
